name: Escape Goat (itch)
description:
A fall into the musty church basement quickly turns into a trap-filled nightmare. Meet a friendly rat, dodge muddle puddles, and escape the dungeon!

---------------------------------------

      Find the keys     

    Use hiding spots    

     Lure the Beast!    

---------------------------------------

ESCAPE GOAT uses 3D Sound

  Headphones are Recommended  

---------------------------------------

Controls 

WASD to move

Space to interact

---------------------------------------

 Escape Goat was created for the 2022.2 Brackeys Game Jam by: 

 Ppdolphinyy  

lead programmer and artist

 Jaknifed  

composer, sound designer, and programmer

---------------------------------------

All elements of the game are wholly original; all sound effects are royalty free and edited.
